item.description:
In this workshop, you will begin to learn the basics of storytelling and how it differs from an anecdote, a theatrical performance, and stand-up.  Your life experiences are mined to craft a meaningful story. The workshop offers interactive activities that focus on finding key sensory details while keeping to an economy of words.  Presentation skills and vocal delivery will also be highlighted. 

This workshop helps experienced tellers who are trying to hone their timed storytelling skills and those who have not told stories publicly.

The workshop begins promptly at 6:30pm.  Please arrive by 6:15pm to sign in.

All attendees will have the opportunity to present their story in a open mic format.

Taught by massmouth's professional storytellers.

massmouth, inc is a 501(c)3 non-profit that promotes the timeless art of storytelling through social media, education and live performance.

www.massmouth.com

www.massmouth.org

email: stories@massmouth.com

massmouth will begin its 3rd season of story slams in September 11, 2011.  Story slams will be held in Jamaica Plain, Cambridge , Somerville,Lowell and Quincy locations.

"Because you have a life, you have a story."
item.how_to_find_us: Short Walk From Green Street T Station JP/Street Parking After 6pm

group.name: Greater Boston and MA Storytelling Meetup Group

item.name: How To Tell A 5 Minute KickButt Story Workshop
